{"draw":0,"recordsTotal":2,"recordsFiltered":2,"data":[{"id":548,"type":"Hijacked - My account was abused by hijacker","appellant":"76561198061404832 (Just Liu)","alts":"","description":"First of all, good day or afternoon to you admins. On May 27, my account was unfortunately hacked, because a friend of mine sent me a link, under the excuse of wanting to withdraw money from the account and that I needed to enter mine, I believed him since he had already entered a few times to my account to share games. I was not, at the time, aware that he had just been hacked and that a strange bot was posing as him. I trusted him and unfortunately my account fell into his hands. Fortunately after speaking with steam support I was able to get my account back, but the damage was already done. At no point throughout my time on steam did I have the desire or the need to harm other people through trading. Here is the evidence I was able to collect. In the images I could see how the impostor got rid of my cell phone, how my account changed. Even the IP of the changes made doesn't make sense, beacuse I'm mexican. I am also attaching the email that Steam sent me, proving that I am finally in control of the account. I'm just fixing this problem, because I've recently taken an interest in the trade and only just found out about the problem. I'm not going to lie, this is something that bothers me, due to the number of people who were affected by my incompetence. Thank you very much for your attention and I hope to solve this problem.​  ","evidence":"https://files.f-o-g.eu/edb74103f672300g6dd98a6f9g9125d0 https://files.f-o-g.eu/e43ac0bfbg9g90cg98aac23b3cagee57 https://files.f-o-g.eu/5f36f5bcg9503eaf26ee6bg0bee70412 ","assignee_id":null,"state_id":1,"views":27,"locked":0,"creator_id":1224,"modificator_id":1224,"created_at":"27.09.2022 01:17:58","updated_at":"2022-09-27 01:17:58","state":"Pending","assignee":"
Unassigned

I promise it was a mistake and it will never happen again. I request you to forgive my apology, my mistake and lift my ban.
